content: Link for mobile users: #15380. This PR ports some basic topological properties of ENat from Peter Nelson's matroid project. It ports just enough to turn #15344 into a single line term proof (similar to its equivalent in ENNReal). I intentionally ported only the basics, with hopes for the rest to be added eventually, to ease the review process as #15344 depends on this. Reviews highly appreciated!
This seems to duplicate #15774. cc @Kalle Kytölä

I took a quick look at #15774, although there is some duplication, there is also a lot of non-duplication. Perhaps we can get one of the PRs merged, then treat the other PR as adding to the first one?
Note that I created this PR two weeks ago, I had no idea Kalle is working on this. Sorry!

This was my bad!

I didn't need a topology on ENat until a few days ago. When I did, I just created one since I found nothing on Mathlib, but I did not check the open PRs.

For my purposes either version of the ENat topology suffices, for sure! @Rida Hamadani's PR has been there for longer, so to me it looks like a priority. In case the other PR contains something that is not covered in the first one, I can try to add those parts later.

Actually, the matroid project as a whole clearly has had more use on the ENat topology than my use case, which is totally superficial.

Clearly the right course of action to have those PR'd. If I ever need anything from my PR, I will try to add it in separate PRs.

As for resolving the conflicting PRs, is it enough that I mark #15774 dependent on #15380? (Maybe #15774 should not be totally abandoned, in case there is some non-overlapping pieces worth keeping.)
@Kalle Kytölä do you want to review Rida's PR?
The common parts of the PRs are similar (I think both PRs took inspiration from ENNReal's topology?). This will probably make a dependency easier. :octopus:
